name: A Wonderful Monster Life DEMO
description:
(ONLY WORKS ON PC, not mac)

Ever dreamed of solving highschool mysteries AND date monster girls at the same time? It's now (almost) possible!

This is a demo of a game currently in production called A Wonderful Monster Life. This demo serves as an introduction to the first chapter i'm currently working on, you'll be able to meet all the girls and get an idea of the overall scenario of the game.

"I've finally transferred to the highschool I've always dreamed of! But something seems odd ... There's a weird club rebelling against the school, I wonder what's up with that...?"
